Description.p: A vocabulary to represent the continuing healthcare eligibility options.

concept.displayName: Not eligible for National Health Service continuing healthcare
National Health Service continuing healthcare assessment in progress
Not yet been screened under the Continuing Healthcare Assessment
The person has refused consent to be screened under the Continuing Healthcare Assessment
Continuing healthcare will not be required
Continuing healthcare has not been considered yet
Continuing healthcare review requirement is not known yet
Continuing healthcare review needs to be started
